## Pipe.setId() method

Sets the ID of the pipe.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setId(id: string): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  id | string | The ID to be assigned. |

**Returns:**

this

The same pipe instance, to support method chaining.
